TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed WebEventCodes extends System.Object

summary.span: 定义与 ASP.NET 状况监视事件关联的代码。

span.span: Defines the codes associated with the ASP.NET health monitoring events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET health monitoring 允许生产和运营人员管理已部署的 Web 应用程序。ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications. 命名空间包含的运行状况事件类型负责打包应用程序运行状况数据，以及负责处理此数据的提供程序类型。The namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data. 它还包含在运行状况事件的管理过程中可帮助的支持类型。It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events. 类包含标识运行状况监视事件类型的代码。The class contains codes that identify types of health-monitoring events. 类中定义了两种类型的代码：主要代码，用于标识 ASP.NET 的运行状况监视事件;和详细信息代码，提供有关相关主要代码的详细信息。Two types of codes are defined within the class: major codes, which identify the ASP.NET health-monitoring events; and detail codes, which provide more information about a related major code. 这些代码实现为整数而不是枚举，以允许进行扩展性。These codes are implemented as integers, rather than as an enumeration, to allow for extensibility. 当引发运行状况监视事件时，该事件与主要事件代码相关联。When a health-monitoring event is raised, it is associated with a major event code. 以下列表标识了在类中定义的主要事件代码的类别 ：The following list identifies the categories of major event codes that are defined within the class: - **应用程序代码**。**Application codes**. 应用程序代码在应用程序的生存期内标识事件，例如启动和关闭事件。Application codes identify events in the lifetime of an application, such as startup and shutdown events. 它们的值大于 字段常量。Their values are greater than the field constant. 它们与 事件类型相关联。They are associated with the event type. 检测信号事件是一种特殊类型的应用程序事件。The heartbeat event is a special kind of application event. 它标识周期性间隔引发的事件，以提供与正在运行的进程的状态相关的信息。It identifies events raised at periodic intervals to provide information relative to the state of the running process. 它与 事件类型相关联。It is associated with the event type. - **请求代码**。**Request codes**. 请求代码标识提供每个请求信息的非错误事件。Request codes identify non-error events that provide per-request information. 它们的值大于 字段常量。Their values are greater than the field constant. 它们与 事件类型相关联。They are associated with the event type. - **错误代码**。**Error codes**. 错误代码标识包含两种错误的相关信息的事件：专门与 Web 请求相关的错误和系统错误。Error codes identify events that contain information about two kinds of errors: errors specifically related to a Web request and systemic errors. 与 Web 请求相关的错误包括未经处理的异常、视图状态错误和输入验证错误。The errors related to Web requests include unhandled exceptions, view-state errors, and input-validation errors. 它们与 事件类型相关联。They are associated with the event type. 系统错误与配置或应用程序代码相关，包括分析器错误和编译错误。The systemic errors relate to configuration or application code, including parser errors and compilation errors. 它们与 事件类型相关联。They are associated with the event type. 两种类型的错误都具有大于 字段常量的值。Both kinds of errors have values greater than the field constant. - **审核代码**。**Audit codes**. 审核代码标识包含可审核信息的事件，例如登录尝试、访问安全冲突和授权违规。Audit codes identify events that contain auditable information such as login attempts, access security violations, and authorization violations. 它们的值大于 。Their values are greater than . 它们与其派生的 事件类型相关联。They are associated with and its derived event types. - **杂项代码**。**Miscellaneous codes**. 其他代码不标识事件，而是用于标记非标准事件信息。Miscellaneous codes do not identify events but are used to flag nonstandard event information. 它们的值大于 。Their values are greater than . 有关详细信息，请参阅。Refer also to for more information. 您可以通过选择上面的代码值来创建自己的自定义事件代码 。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above . 在 " `eventMappings` 运行状况监视配置" 元素中，可以选择指定事件代码范围。In the `eventMappings` health-monitoring configuration element, you can optionally specify an event-code range. 如果指定了事件代码范围，映射仅适用于在该范围内具有事件代码的事件;否则，它将应用于所有事件代码。If the event code range is specified, the mapping only applies to the events that have an event code within that range; otherwise, it applies to all the event codes. 下面的配置文件节选显示了 配置的，以处理 其事件代码属于审核类别的事件。The following configuration file excerpt shows the configured to handle events whose event codes belong to the audit category. ``` ``` 您可以通过选择上面的代码值来创建自己的自定义事件代码 。You can create your own custom event code by choosing code values above .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视应用程序事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring application event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与类型关联的主要事件代码的偏移量 。The value represents the offset for major event codes associated with the type. 为所有应用程序代码分配的值大于 。All application codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的编译已完成的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has finished.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值是一个主要代码，其值大于 值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. 当应用程序的编译结束时，ASP.NET 将引发相关事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application ends.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的编译已开始的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the compilation of the application has started.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值是一个主要代码，其值大于 值。The value is a major code and its value is greater than the value. 当应用程序的编译启动时，ASP.NET 将引发相关事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the compilation of the application starts.

summary.span: 标识应用程序的详细事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the application detail event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与类型关联的详细信息事件代码范围的偏移量 。The value represents the offset for the detail event code range associated with the type. 为所有应用程序详细信息代码分配的值大于 。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示信号事件发生的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a heartbeat event occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要代码，其值大于 。The is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 按 配置文件定义的定期间隔引发相关事件。ASP.NET raises the related event at a periodic interval, as defined by the configuration file.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序已关闭的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an application has shut down.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是主要代码，其值大于 。 is a major code and its value is greater than . ASP.NET 在 应用程序关闭时引发相关事件。ASP.NET raises the related event when the application shuts down.

summary.span: 表示的是指示应用程序的 Bin 目录中的子目录已更改或已重命名的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory was changed or renamed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指定关闭原因的详细信息代码。The is the detail code that specifies the causes of the shutdown. 当应用程序的 Bin 目录中的子目录更改或重命名时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When a subdirectory in the application's Bin directory is changed or renamed, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中文件授权失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与访问未被授权的文件相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is not granted. 当文件授权失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When a file-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中文件授权成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a file-authorization success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与为其授予授权的文件的访问相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the access of a file for which authorization is granted. 文件授权成功后，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When a file authorization is successful, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中窗体身份验证失败的事件代码。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中窗体身份验证成功的事件代码。

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中发生了未处理的访问异常的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled access exception occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是未经处理的运行状况事件的主要代码，与未被授权的资源的访问权限相关。 is the major code for the unhandled health event related to the access of a resource for which authorization is not granted. 发生此事件时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this event occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中发生了未处理的安全性异常的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unhandled security exception occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与安全冲突相关的未处理的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code of the unhandled health event related to a security violation. 当引发未处理的安全异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When an unhandled security exception is thrown, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中 URL 授权失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a URL-authorization failure occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与使用未被授权的 URL 相关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is not granted. 如果 URL 授权失败，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When the URL-authorization failure occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示在 Web 请求过程中 URL 授权成功的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a URL-authorization success occurred during a Web request.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是与使用授权的 URL 有关的运行状况事件的主要代码。 is the major code for the health event related to the use of a URL for which authorization is granted. 成功授权 URL 后，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When a URL is successfully authorized, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视错误事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring error event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与和类型关联的主要事件代码范围的偏移量 。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the and types. 为所有错误代码分配的值大于 。All error codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的票证已过期的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is expired.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用户身份验证失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 当用户的身份验证由于过期票证而失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When the user's authentication fails due to an expired ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示使用了不允许的事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the event code value is not allowed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示系统不允许使用的代码值。The represents the use of a code value that is not allowed by the system. 例如，如果自定义 ASP.NET health 监视事件并使用系统已分配的代码值，则可能会发生这种情况。For instance, this can happen if you customize an ASP.NET health-monitoring event and use a code value that is already assigned by the system.

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的票证无效的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied ticket is invalid.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定用户身份验证失败的原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the user's authentication failure. 当用户的身份验证因票证无效而失败时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When the user's authentication fails due to an invalid ticket, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的视图状态无效的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state is invalid.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定视图状态失败原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. 当发生视图状态错误时，ASP.NET 将引发， 其中的主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When the view-state error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示提供的视图状态未通过完整性检查的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the supplied view state failed the integrity check.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指定视图状态失败原因的详细信息代码。 is the detail code that specifies the cause of the view-state failure. 当提供的视图状态未通过完整性检查时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When the supplied view state fails the integrity check, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and a detail code of .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 杂项事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web miscellaneous event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与未分类的运行状况事件关联的主要事件代码范围的偏移量。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with health events that have not been categorized. 为所有其他代码分配的值大于 。All miscellaneous codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 请求事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-request event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与类型关联的主要事件代码范围的偏移量 。The value represents the offset for the major event code range associated with the type. 所有请求代码都被赋予大于 的值。All request codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求被中止的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was aborted.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是引用 Web 请求异常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a Web-request abnormal termination. 当 Web 请求中止时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When a Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求已完成的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request was completed.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是引用 Web 请求正常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a Web request normal termination. 当 Web 请求正常完成时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When the Web request completes normally, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发送的信息大小超过了允许的限制的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the size of the posted information exceeded the allowed limits.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是引用数据的主要代码，其大小超过了允许的限制。 is the major code that refers to a data posting whose size exceeds the allowed limits. 当窗体发送超过允许的限制的数据时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When a form posts data that exceeds the allowed limits, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示 Web 请求已中止的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the Web request has been aborted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指引用 Web 请求的异常终止的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to the abnormal termination of the Web request. 当 Web 请求中止时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When the Web request aborts, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了未经处理的异常的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating an unhandled exception occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要代码是指不是由 ASP.NET 处理的异常。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of an exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 发生异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When the exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了验证错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a validation error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是指不是由 ASP.NET 处理的验证异常的出现的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to the occurrence of a validation exception that is not handled by ASP.NET. 发生此异常时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this exception occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示视图状态失败的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that a view-state failure occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引用视图状态失败的主要代码。 is the major code that refers to a view-state failure. 发生这种情况时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this happens, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码表示在访问 Web 资源期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error accessing a web resource.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示 SQL 提供程序丢弃了事件的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the SQL provider dropped events.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通知发生在删除事件的时间之后，会向 SQL server 写入一条特殊警告行。When the notification occurs after the one during which events have been dropped, a special warning row is written to the SQL server. 此行将在通知中的所有其他事件之前写入，并且不会在所配置的刷新大小所涉及的总事件总数中进行计数。This row is written before all other events in the notification, and is not counted in the total number of events as far as the configured flush size is concerned.

summary.span: 表示的是指示在与状态服务器通信时发生错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an error occurred while communicating with the state server.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当与状态服务器通信时出现连接错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 ，详细信息代码为 。When a connection error occurs while communicating with the state server, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of and detail code of . 是详细信息代码，其值大于 。The is a detail code and its value is greater than the .

summary.span: 表示的是指示未定义主要事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the major event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用系统未定义的主要代码值。 represents the use of a major code value that is not defined by the system.

summary.span: 表示的是指示未定义详细事件代码值的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that the detail event code value is not defined.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示使用系统未定义的详细信息代码值。 represents the use of a detail code value that is not defined by the system.

summary.span: 指示发生了编译错误。

span.span: Indicates that a compilation error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要代码是指在应用程序编译阶段发生的错误。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application compilation phase. 发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 指示发生了配置错误。

span.span: Indicates that a configuration error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要代码是指在应用程序配置阶段发生的错误。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-configuring phase. 发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码指示在反序列化对象的类型或值期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of the type or value of an object.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了未分类错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that an unclassified error occurred.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是未分类错误的主要代码。 is the major code for an unclassified error. 发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示的是指示发生了分析器错误的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating a parser error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主要代码是指在应用程序分析阶段发生的错误。 is the major code that refers to an error that happened during the application-parsing phase. 发生此错误时，ASP.NET 将引发，其 主要代码为 。When this error occurs, ASP.NET raises a with a major code of .

summary.span: 表示事件代码，该代码指示在反序列化属性期间发生了错误。

span.span: Represents the event code indicating that there was an error during the deserialization of a property.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

summary.span: 标识 ASP.NET 状况监视 Web 详细事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the ASP.NET health-monitoring Web-detail event codes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该值表示与类型关联的详细信息事件代码范围的偏移量 。The value represents the offset for the detail-event code range associated with the type. 为所有应用程序详细信息代码分配的值大于 。All application detail codes are assigned values greater than .

summary.span: 表示的是提供程序用于记录有关事件的非标准信息的事件代码。

span.span: Represents the event code used by providers to record nonstandard information about an event.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供程序用来存储非标准运行状况事件信息的主要代码。 is the major code used by providers to store nonstandard health event information. 其值大于 。Its value is greater than . 例如，如果在缓冲过程中删除 ASP.NET 运行状况事件，则 会向消息顶部添加一条警告，而不会使用 。但用于 编写此警告的唯一方法是在数据库中创建一条记录。For example, if ASP.NET health events are dropped during buffering, the adds a warning to the top of the messages without using the .But the only way for the to write this warning is to create a record in the database. 由于数据库中的每个记录都需要事件 ID，因此提供程序使用 作为其主要代码，并使用 作为详细代码来创建此 id。Because every record in the database needs an event ID, the provider uses the as its major code and as the detail code to create this ID. > [!NOTE] > 正如你在上一讨论中看到的那样，未 与任何 ASP.NET health 事件关联。As you can see from the above discussion, the is not associated with any ASP.NET health event.

summary.span: 标识自定义事件代码的偏移量。

span.span: Identifies the offset for the custom event codes.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果创建自己的自定义事件，则必须使用值大于的事件代码 。If you create your own custom event, you must use an event code with a value greater than .
